name: CAE Santiago
about: CAE Santiago is a premier flight training facility located close to Santiago International Airport in Chile. As part of CAE's global network, it offers comprehensive airline pilot and cabin crew training programs using state-of-the-art equipment, including CAE 7000XR series full-flight simulators. The centre provides ground school and simulator pilot training, catering to the growing pilot training needs of airlines in the Americas. With a commitment to excellence and safety, CAE Santiago is a leading choice for aspiring pilots, ensuring they receive the highest standard of training to succeed in their aviation careers. CAE Santiago is dedicated to making flying safer and more efficient.
services:
["Airline Pilot Training
Business Pilot Training
Aircraft Maintenance Training
Available Aircraft Platforms for Training"]
